products.title: Turin 25mm Pure White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of turin 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. This pure white perfect fit venetian blind adds a fresh white shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with bright accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are a drill-free and screw-free way to fit blinds to a upvc window or door - ensuring the frame warranty is protected.

products.title: Pure Perfect Fit
products.description: A brilliant white shade, the pure white 25mm perfect fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any white upvc window or door. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected.

products.title: Sunwood Pure White Perfect Fit Wood Blind
products.description: Perfect fit wood venetian blinds are manufactured from high quality wood. Available in 12 colour shades. Sunwood pure white perfect fit wood blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
